SELECT jr.Id, jr.BoardId, jr.ApplyUserId, bo.UserId, bo.Nickname, bo.Title, si.SeminarStartDate, si.SeminarEndDate, si.Locale, si.MeetingDate, ui.profileImagePath FROM JoiningAndRecruitmentLog jr INNER JOIN Board AS bo ON bo.Id=jr.BoardId INNER JOIN SeminarInfo AS si ON si.BoardId = jr.BoardId INNER JOIN UserInfo AS ui ON ui.UserId = bo.UserId WHERE jr.ApplyUserId=#{userId} AND bo.BoardKindId='SmnMo' AND (jr.Status is NULL OR jr.Status='')
